item.description:
Get to know you drinks for Fat Tuesday.... For those who are not in the know, Fat Tuesday is the day before Ash Wednesday when Lent starts and so is typically a day for eating, drinking and making the most of whatever bad habits you intend to drop until easter.

However, dont get me wrong. I like to think that I dont have enough bad habits that I can afford to give one up (only an aquired fondness for the phrase "all set" and sometimes rhyming the word can't with ant instead of aunt). And I have ABSOLUTELY no intention of giving up either food or drink for any reason, especially not for some bloke who is supposed to forgive you all your sins!

But I digress, they day just worked well in my calendar really.

So I hope you will be able to come out and meet up - if I have picked a bad day and enough people tell me I can reshedule. Hope to see you out!

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Fat Tuesday Meet Up Drinks
